articles.author: Warren P. Strobel, John Hudson, Karen DeYoung
articles.title: Trump says he has authorized covert CIA action in Venezuela - The Washington Post
articles.description: The CIA has surged personnel to the Caribbean and Central America as part of the Trump administration’s crackdown on drug cartels in the region, people familiar with the matter say.
articles.content: President Donald Trump said Wednesday that he had authorized the Central Intelligence Agency to conduct operations in Venezuela, markedly escalating U.S. pressure on President Nicolás Maduro amid a s… [+106 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: What is the chikungunya virus now transmitted in the US for the first time in years? - AP News
articles.description: A mosquito-borne virus more common in South America has been detected in the United States. Health officials say the chikungunya virus has been identified in a patient living in the suburbs of New York City who began experiencing symptoms in August. Authoriti…
articles.content: A person living in the suburbs of New York City has tested positive for chikungunya, a mosquito-borne virus that is more often seen in South America and hasnt been transmitted on the U.S. mainland in… [+4550 chars]
